name: TableColumn
description: Represents a column in a table.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Returns a unique key that identifies the column within the table.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Represents the name of the table column.

properties.name: index
properties.description: Returns the index number of the column within the columns collection of the table. Zero-indexed.

properties.name: values
properties.description: Represents the raw values of the specified range. The data returned could be of type string, number, or a boolean. Cell that contain an error will return the error string.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: Retrieve the filter applied to the column.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Gets the range object associated with the entire column.

methods.name: getHeaderRowRange
methods.description: Gets the range object associated with the header row of the column.

methods.name: getDataBodyRange
methods.description: Gets the range object associated with the data body of the column.

methods.name: getTotalRowRange
methods.description: Gets the range object associated with the totals row of the column.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the column from the table.
